attributes.action: Reconsider Farm IHT Proposal for Viable Farm Continuity & National Food Security
attributes.additional_details: Due to the inevitable consequences of an implementation of this proposal on nationwide Sustainable Farming Continuity (i.e. the feasibility of younger generations taking on farms as a viable and profitable profession), and on National Food Security, as a necessary and prudent step for our national well-being, especially in the light of current world conflicts and events.
attributes.background: Reconsider proposed changes to Farm Inheritance Tax for the reasons of Sustainable Farming Continuity (i.e. the feasibility of younger generations taking on farms as a viable and profitable profession), and in the interests of National Food Security, especially in the light of current world events.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700138
